concept.title: Select VRM file dialog box
concept.shortdesc: The Select VRM File dialog box enables you to select a point cloud VRM file to import into the current cache folder.

section.title: Navigation pane
section.p: Enables you to easily navigate to frequently used locations.

dlentry.dd: Displays links to your most requently used file locations. These change based on your behavior.
Displays links to locations on your desktop.
Displays links to root locations on the computer including the Desktop, Documents folder, Downloads folder, drives, and network locations.

section.title: Look in
section.p: Specifies the current location in which to select a VRM file.

section.title: Go to last folder visited
section.p: Changes the current location to the last folder visited.

section.title: Up one level
section.p: Changes the current location to one level up from its current location.

section.title: Create new folder
section.p: Creates a new subfolder in the current location.

section.title: View menu
section.p: Opens the view menu.

section.title: Name
section.p: Displays a list of items in the current location. The list may be limited by the specified file type.

section.title: Date modified
section.p: Displays the date and time for the most recent change to each item in the current location.

section.title: Type
section.p: Displays the file type or folder for each item in the current location.

section.title: Size
section.p: Displays the file size for each item in the current location.

section.title: Description
section.p: Displays information about a selected file in the list.

section.title: Size
section.p: Displays the file size of the selected file.

section.title: Created
section.p: Displays the creation date and time of the selected file.

section.title: Modified
section.p: Displays the date and time of the most recent modification to the selected file.

section.title: Accessed
section.p: Displays the date and time of the most recent access to the selected file.

section.title: Open as read-only
section.p: Specifies if the file should be open as read-only

section.title: Use preview
section.p: Enables a preview of the selected file.

section.title: Preview
section.p: Displays a preview of the selected file if one is available.

section.title: File name
section.p: Specifies the name of the selected file.

section.title: File type
section.p: Specifies the file type(s) to display in the list.

section.title: Open
section.p: Imports the selected VRM file to the current cache location as specified by the POINTCLOUDCACHEFOLDER system variable. This can be especially useful for sharing point cloud datasets between users.

section.title: Cancel
section.p: Cancels the operation without importing the selected VRM file.
